column1: * 1912 - German translator Margaret Carroux is born.
* 1981 - The thirteenth episode of the The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC.
Note: Months of the Shire Calendar only have 30 days
column2: so no events have nor will happen on the 31st.Category:Datesfi:31. toukokuuta
